Text: ReBoot was 1994 to 2001, also, you listed the episodes wrong, it should be S01E01, S02E01, etc!

Thanks for the upload. Reboot was 4 seasons, 1994-1998 were the first 3 seasons & season 4 came much later in 2001. It did not run from 1994 through 2001. There were 48 episodes in all. You can find all the info you need here, http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ReBoot 
& here,
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ReBoot_episodes
